snippet: PERKINS--Edward. The New York Times records with deep sorrow the passing of Edward Perkins, associated with The New York Times from July 8, 1978 until retiring on March 2, 2008. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PERKINS--Edward. The New York Times records with deep sorrow the passing of Edward Perkins, associated with The New York Times from July 8, 1978 until retiring on March 2, 2008. 1/3
